infobox.Japanese title:: 俺が愛したミステリー  (Ore ga Aishita Misuterii)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Shinichi Kudo  Detective Kawanaka
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Natsuko Sebata as Murako Saikawa  Minoru Inaba as Yasunobu Shimasaki  Nobuo Tobita as Shunichi Tono  Ryuji Nakagi as Keizo Murata  Hiromichi Kogami as Deliveryman  Tetsuo Mizutori as Sushi shop owner
infobox.Closing song:: Mō Kimi Dake o Hanashitari wa Shinai

sections.Situation: A murder occurs in an apartment. The victim is a famous detective author.
sections.People:
- Victim (beaten)
- 65 years old
- Mystery writer
- 26 years old
- Mystery publication editor
- 55 years old
- Pearl Mansion's manager
- 50 years old
- Mystery publication editor
- Character from Murako's novels
- Takarazushi shop owner
- Delivery company employee
sections.Trivia:
- The journal about Murako Saikawa reappears in Misty Mystery.
- Shinichi read at least one of Murako Saikawa's mystery novels and appeared to really enjoy it.
